certifications.title: Developing backend apps with Node JS and Express JS
Introduction to Frontend Development with React JS

projects.name: Bikes
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web application for booking, rental, and servicing, achieving user satisfaction to 20%. Implemented role-based authentication and intuitive UI/UX using React.js and Material-UI. Utilized MySQL, and Azure cloud for efficient backend, reducing response time by 40% and ensuring 99.9% uptime.

projects.name: Easyhouse
projects.description: Crafted a house rentals application with secure role-based authentication, increasing login success rate by 15%. Integrated NodeMailer for automated email notifications of booking inquiries, reducing response time by 40%. Developed a responsive frontend with React.js and Material-UI, and a robust backend with Express.js and MySQL on Aiven cloud, achieving 90% uptime and reducing server response time by 35%.

projects.name: Innum Vai
projects.description: Created a user-friendly food ordering site with secure token-based authentication, enhancing login security by 30%. Employed MySQL and Express.js for a robust and seamless backend, improving access speed by 25%. Deployed the frontend on Vercel and the backend on Aiven, ensuring 90% uptime, scalable access from anywhere.

projects.name: Timely Vax
projects.description: Developed a vaccination website with slot booking and status tracking, improving booking efficiency by 40%. Utilized MySQL and Express.js for a structured backend, enhancing data management and retrieval speed by 30%. Deployed the frontend on Vercel, ensuring a professional platform for convenient and reliable slot reservations.

experiences.description: Contributed to crafting a Parcel Tracking System web application, enhancing tracking efficiency with serial data using springboot. Integrated Raspberry Pi and RFID technology for automated tracking, resulting in optimized parcel management.

Integrated Unmanned Ground Vehicles (UGVs) into our MERN stack-inventory management app, optimizing efficiency. Streamlined Agile collaboration for a user-friendly interface with role-based authentication. Leveraged UGVs to enhance development processes, delivering a well-documented inventory management system.
